user.title: Set up Centauri Carbon Spool Manager
user.description:
Select your 3D printer and configure spool tracking.

**What you'll get:**
• Automatic filament usage tracking
• Weight and length calculations
• Print history with undo functionality
• Services for spool management

Printer entities will be auto-detected from the Elegoo integration.

confirm.title: Confirm Setup
confirm.description:
Ready to create {num_spools} spool tracking entities.

All entities will be created automatically - no manual configuration needed!
